pageContext.claim: “The Washington Post is a Fact Checker only for the Democrats. For the Republicans, and for your all time favorite President, it is a Fake Fact Checker!”
pageContext.analysis: We have an obvious conflict here, but we are including this in the database because Trump has cited the Fact Checker when we have called out falsehoods by Democrats. So obviously it is not just for Democrats. (We are not sure what prompted this tweet, though it happened on a day when we announced a new total for statements in this database.)
